name: Generate Custom Template
author: Syed Umair Hussain Shah

sections.description:
Generate Custom Template easily through wordpress admin area.

Major Features in Generate Custom Template:

  • Create Custom Template.
  • Generated Custom Template Listing.
  • Add Html in Custom Template

Requirements:

WordPress
sections.installation: Upload the Generate Custom Template plugin in your Website and Activate it.

short_description: Generate Custom Template easily through wordpress admin area.
description:
Generate Custom Template easily through wordpress admin area.

Major Features in Generate Custom Template:

  • Create Custom Template.
  • Generated Custom Template Listing.
  • Add Html in Custom Template

Requirements:

WordPress

screenshots.caption: Activate Generate Custom Template Plugin and Click on Generate Custom Templates Link. 1) Enter Template Name 2) Enter Template File Name (Please enter template file name without .php extension) 3) Enter Template Description (You can also add html on textarea)
Your custom template show in listing admin side..
Your custom template generated in your active theme directory.
